mapper.insert: insert into t_tbaccount_info ( tbaccountid, tbaccountname, tbaccountpwd, tbaccounttime, tbaccountphoneid, tbaccountstate, createtime, createuser, updatetime, updateuser) values ( #{tbaccountid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tbaccountname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tbaccountpwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tbaccounttime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tbaccountphoneid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tbaccountstate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatetime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select * from t_tbaccount_info where tbaccountphoneid=#{tbaccountphoneid} and (tbaccountstate ='60' or tbaccountstate='61')
select * from t_tbaccount_info where tbaccountname=#{tbaccountname} and tbaccountstate != '65'
mapper.update: update t_tbaccount_info set tbaccountstate=#{tbaccountstate},tbaccounttime=#{tbaccounttime},updatetime=#{updatetime},updateuser=#{updateuser} where tbaccountid=#{tbaccountid} and tbaccountname=#{tbaccountname}
mapper.delete: update t_tbaccount_info set tbaccountstate = '65' where tbaccountid in (#{tbaccountids})
